title: ON LOWER PRIORITY QUEUE FOR 20 MINS AGAIN
body: So basically I was in game and I had to go AFK due to fps and ms problems as my lol game just froze and so I slept my computer for about like 4mins to see if the cause was because of heating problems and when I came back on, I've been given 1 AFK warning and the next thing I find after that game was that I was sent onto the Lower Priority Queue for 20 minutes again for the same stupid reason, fps and ms problems which I could not have avoided. Can riot do anything to help this?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Apologies for such a late response, work and other real life responsibilities have taken much time lately.

Could you run through the [low FPS troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide for me, let me know if anything helps.

I recommend you make a new post here detailing your FPS and freezing issues. A Wrenchmen might be able to fix it for you and stop you from AFKing again in the future.

I know you didn't mean to AFK, but it's important to remember that no matter your intentions, you were still AFK and it ruined the game for everyone else involved. 

**Riot** can't lift any punishments on this because it's your responsibility to ensure your PC and connection are good enough to play. LeaverBuster will allow for rare disconnects, but if it happens to frequently you'll be punished.

Hopefully we can get you back on the rift soon :D
